author: jshlee
body:
ME0Segments changed reference detector from etaPartition to chamber
* ME0SegmentAlgorithm.cc - changed ME0EtaPartition -> ME0Chamber, bug fix for failed fits
* ME0SegmentAlgorithmBase.h - changed ME0EtaPartition -> ME0Chamber
* ME0SegmentBuilder.cc  - changed ME0EtaPartition -> ME0Chamber
* ME0SegmentMatcher.cc - changed ME0EtaPartition -> ME0Chamber
* ME0SegmentsValidation.cc - changed ME0EtaPartition -> ME0Chamber

muonME0DigisPreReco_cfi.py - etaResolution was set to 0, this gave me0RecHits 0 for y error, which made ME0Segment fitting fail.

MuonSegFit - increased number of hits that can be fitted

MuonGEMDetLayerGeometryBuilder.cc added chamber
MuonME0DetLayerGeometryBuilder.cc added chamber

GEMSegment.h and ME0Segment.h to use chamberID

fix ME0Geometry.cc layer and chamber functions

clean up GEMSegmentBuilder.cc

MuonTrackLoader.cc added the case for gemSegments

@calabria @kpedro88 @pietverwilligen @archiesharma @dildick
title: Gem and me0 segment bug fix 81x
